title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Khalil Mack trade grades, explaining the NFL to someone who missed the 2021 season, AFC vs. NFC competitive imbalance + Will the Pick Six pod be around in 10 years? (Football 3/14)
description:
Join the Pick Six March Madness Bracket Challenge for your chance to win a $100 Paramount Plus Gift Card! Enter here:Â cbssports.com/PickSixBrackets

***Note: This episode was recorded before news of Tom Brady's return to the NFL. 
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech are back to answer questions from the Pick Six mailbag. First, they break down the Bears trading Khalil Mack to the Chargers and what it means for both organizations. Next, the guys focus on how much better the AFC seems to be compared to the NFC. With that being said, the NFC boasts the past two Super Bowl champions...Hypothetically, say you missed the entire 2021 NFL season. What are the biggest things you'd need to be caught up on? Well that hypothetical is a reality for one of our listeners who was probably stunned to see the Bengals had made the Super Bowl!!! How long will the Pick Six podcast continue? Could Brinson still be podcasting daily when he's 70? The Superfriends detail how small market vs. big market teams work in the NFL and discuss what college rules they'd like to see brought to the big leagues. That and more on this mailbag episode.Â 

ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Visit the CBS Sports Store to buy Pick Six merch: https://store.cbssports.com/collections/pick-six
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Read the Pick Six newsletter here: https://www.cbssports.com/newsletters/picksix/
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
